Description:
Oversee the planning and execution of preventive maintenance programs for HVAC, electrical, plumbing, and other building systems.
Coordinate with contractors and service providers to schedule repairs, maintenance, and renovations as needed.
Manage facility budgets and expenses, optimizing resource allocation for maintenance and improvement projects.
Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, work orders, and equipment performance.
Lead and supervise facility management staff, providing guidance and support to ensure their productivity and professional development.
Collaborate with other departments and stakeholders to address facility-related issues and ensure seamless operations.
Implement sustainable and energy-efficient practices to reduce the environmental impact of our facilities.
Keep up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in facility management to continuously improve our operations.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience in facility management, preferably in a supervisory or management role.
In-depth knowledge of building systems, equipment, and maintenance procedures.
Strong leadership and communication skills to effectively manage a team and collaborate with various stakeholders.
Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
Ability to prioritize tasks, handle multiple projects, and meet deadlines.
Familiarity with relevant laws, regulations, and safety standards in facility management.
Proficiency in computer software and facility management systems.
A proactive and proactive approach to identifying and resolving facility-related issues.
